definition: to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)

sentences.english: I got my ball back from him yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 我昨天从他那儿把我的球取回来了。

sentences.english: Therefore doth my Father love me, because I lay down my life, that I might take it again.
sentences.chinese: 我父爱我，因我将命舍去，好再取回来。

sentences.english: The second part is about the analysis of the right foundation of the Bankruptcy Recall Right.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分是有关破产取回权行使的相关问题的分析。

sentences.english: If you drop something on the trackway , do not attempt to retrieve it!
sentences.chinese: 若您的物品跌落轨道，切勿自行取回。

sentences.english: Retakes the current time on the outbound response.
sentences.chinese: 取回出站响应的当前时间。

sentences.english: You have to hurdle to London and get the intelligence back.
sentences.chinese: 你得克服困难到达伦敦把那份情报取回来。

sentences.english: The next day, shu mei in order to retrieve the phone, deliberately take open car back to the company.
sentences.chinese: 翌日，淑梅为了取回手机，刻意乘坐开朗的车回公司。

sentences.english: Yesterday he took back from machine shop.
sentences.chinese: 昨天他从机厂取回了试压泵。

sentences.english: Tomorrow I will bring them to my home, and from now on we will live together and wait for your return.
sentences.chinese: 你的老小，我明日便取回去养在家里，待你回来完聚。

sentences.english: And for same-day. will I get the dress and skirt back this evening?
sentences.chinese: 如果当日取，我可以在今晚前取回我的衣服和裙子吗？

sentences.english: North Dakota attempted to take back the snow angel record Saturday.
sentences.chinese: 星期六北达科他州试图取回雪天使最高记录。

sentences.english: When can I have my laundry back?
sentences.chinese: 我何时能取回洗的衣服呢？

sentences.english: Wilson is charged with petit theft and resisting recovery of property.
sentences.chinese: 威尔士以小偷小盗和持续取回财产的抗辩而被控诉。

sentences.english: How soon can I have my clothes back?
sentences.chinese: 我的衣服什么时候可以取回来？

sentences.english: The second part maily talk about how to use and haw to limit the recall right.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分，作者对取回权的行使及限制进行论述。

definition: to return something to its rightful owner
to hold in safekeeping/to have in one's care/to guarantee/certainly/surely/custodian/curator
to take for one's own/to expropriate
to pass on to sb/to carry and give to sb else
to steal (including identity theft, credit card fraud or theft of computer account)/to misappropriate
